summary:
Geoscientist with 20 years of multidisciplinary and multicultural experience, focused on business delivery, regarded as a motivating technical leader building relationship on integrity and respect.
Key skills and competencies:
•	Geophysics: quantitative interpretation (incl. AvA & 4D), interpretation and time-depth conversion.
•	Geology: operations, regional and prospect evaluation, static model building.
•	Petrophysics: logging operations (QC), log evaluation and modeling, rock physics.
•	Contract management: administration, finance, commercial evaluation & tender preparation.
•	Integrated projects management with proven track records of technical and planning skills.
